articles.title: Underfunded IRS struggles to send refunds, answer calls
articles.description: 2019 was a tough year for the IRS, a new federal report says
articles.content:
2019 was another tough year for the IRS, according to a new federal report.
Burdened with years of budget cuts and a recent increase in workload to implement a new tax law, the IRS struggled to deliver on its mission in the past fiscal year. The annual repor… [+3804 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Man saves California's oldest weekly newspaper from closure
articles.description: A retiree is canceling an around-the-world trip to save California's oldest weekly newspaper
articles.content:
DOWNIEVILLE, Calif. -- 
A retiree has canceled an around-the-world trip to save California's oldest weekly newspaper, which was set to shut down when its editor retires this month.
The paper began in 1853 as a twice-per-month publication; its claim to fame … [+1894 chars]

articles.content:

A Texas-based salvage company will cut up and remove a 656-foot (200- meter) shipwreck from St. Simons Sound off the coast of Georgia.

articles.title: Electric scooter injuries surge along with their popularity
articles.description: Health researchers say electric scooter injuries have surged along with their popularity
articles.content:
Electric scooter injuries have surged along with their popularity in the United States, nearly tripling over four years, researchers said in a study published Wednesday.
Nearly 40,000 broken bones, head injuries, cuts and bruises resulting from scooter accid… [+1485 chars]

articles.title: 'Ugly Betty' co-creator Silvio Horta dies in Miami at 45
articles.description: Award-winning producer Silvio Horta acclaimed for creating the hit TV series “Ugly Betty” has died at 45
articles.content:
MIAMI -- 
Award-winning producer Silvio Horta, who was acclaimed for creating the hit series Ugly Betty with actress Salma Hayek, has died. He was 45. 
The Miami-Dade County Medical Examiner said Wednesday that based on the investigation Horta died by suici… [+952 chars]

articles.author: Karolina Rivas
articles.title: Teen helps rescue avalanche survivor trapped 9 feet under snow
articles.description: After an avalanche trapped multiple skiers in Idaho, rescuers used 10-foot-poles to probe for people.
articles.content:
Rescue efforts concluded on Tuesday after an avalanche trapped inbound skiers at Silver Mountain Resort, Idaho.
Two people were killed but five were rescued.
Among those scouring the slopes as part of the rescue effort was 17-year-old Blaine Goodner, who al… [+1228 chars]
